definition: (idiom) to be unable to return to one's hometown due to the shame of failure (originally referred to Xiang Yu 項羽|项羽[Xiang4 Yu3], who chose not to retreat to Jiangdong after his humiliating defeat)
pinyin: wu2 yan2 jian4 Jiang1 dong1 fu4 lao3

definition: to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
